radiographic_examinations.findings: Distended gallbladder with surrounding pericholecystic fluid. Gallbladder wall edematous and minimally thickened at 4 mm. Layering sludge within the gallbladder. No evidence for cholelithiasis. Normal liver echotexture without focal liver lesion. No intrahepatic biliary dilatation. Common bile duct measures 3 mm. Main portal vein patent with hepatopetal flow. No evidence for ascites in the visualized upper abdomen. Spleen measures 11.5 cm.
